channel.title: Making pickup command log?
channel.description: ive just finished modding my pickup command to make it so you cant spawn phats, rares and such at player rights 2 or below, now how can i make it so it logs into a file saying "playerName+"has spawned "+itemName+itemAmount"?[br][size=1]Posted on: July 14, 2007, 11:28:40 AM[/size][hr]anyone?

item.title: Making pickup command log?
item.dc:creator: @i_own_pking i_own_pking
item.description:
@i_own_pking wrote:

ive just finished modding my pickup command to make it so you cant spawn phats, rares and such at player rights 2 or below, now how can i make it so it logs into a file saying "playerName+"has spawned “+itemName+itemAmount”?[br][size=1]Posted on: July 14, 2007, 11:28:40 AM[/size][hr]anyone?
